param.name: dat_files
param.label: Athena projects
param.help: X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy (XAS) data, in Athena project format

repeat.name: plots
repeat.title: Plots
repeat.help: Each additional entry will create another output plot

param.name: variable
param.label: Variable
param.help: Variable to plot on the y axis

param.name: y_limit_min
param.label: Minimum xμ(E)
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the y axis.

param.name: y_limit_max
param.label: Maximum xμ(E)
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the y axis.

param.name: y_limit_min
param.label: Minimum d(xμ(E))/dE
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the y axis.

param.name: y_limit_max
param.label: Maximum d(xμ(E))/dE
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the y axis.

param.name: x_limit_min
param.label: Minimum r (ang)
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the x axis.

param.name: x_limit_max
param.label: Maximum r (ang)
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the x axis.

param.name: y_limit_min
param.label: Minimum |χ(r)|
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the y axis.

param.name: y_limit_max
param.label: Maximum |χ(r)|
param.help: If set, plot will be limited to this value on the y axis.

tool.help:
Using Larch, read Athena project files and plot data from them.
Only Athena project files are accepted as input. If data is plaintext, first load it using the Larch Athena tool. All input files will appear on the same plot(s). To generate multiple types of plot with the same set of files, add additional sections to the form.
